IncidentDef.label: Mountain air
IncidentDef.letterText: A breath of fresh mountain air. The colonists are feeling better.

IncidentDef.label: Sea air
IncidentDef.letterText: A breath of fresh sea air. The colonists are feeling better.

IncidentDef.label: Death of distant star
IncidentDef.letterText: You can observe in the sky a distant and beautiful picture of the death of a star, which came to you many years later.

IncidentDef.label: Parade of planets
IncidentDef.letterText: The planets of your star system are lined up with a slight deviation.

IncidentDef.label: Summer solstice
IncidentDef.letterText: Midsummer, longest day.

IncidentDef.label: Pocahontas
Snow avalanche
IncidentDef.letterText: An avalanche descends from one of the snowy mountains

IncidentDef.label: Shaman's camp
IncidentDef.letterText: A shaman of a hostile faction has set up a camp near your settlement. He will send disease and misfortune for {0} days, or until his camp is destroyed.

IncidentDef.label: Burning peat bogs
IncidentDef.letterText: Fire breaks out in swampy areas!

IncidentDef.label: Earthquake
IncidentDef.letterText: An earthquake began, everyone in the shelter!

IncidentDef.label: Old man
IncidentDef.letterText: An old man has wandered into your territory, it seems, due to his age, he has become a burden to his tribe. You can talk to him and take him to your settlement. After some time, he will leave your lands.

IncidentDef.label: Collapse
IncidentDef.letterText: The lining of the mine could not withstand the load, and part of the mine collapsed. Fortunately, no one was badly hurt, but the colonists were stuck inside with no way to go outside, and if not rescued, they would die of hunger or lack of fresh air.

IncidentDef.label: Collapse (heavy)
IncidentDef.letterText: The lining of the mine could not withstand the load, and part of the mine collapsed. Unfortunately, some of the colonists were crushed with heaps of earth, and some were stuck inside with no way to go outside, and if not saved, they will die of hunger or lack of fresh air.

IncidentDef.label: Breakthrough water
IncidentDef.letterText: The water inflow into the mine is growing too fast, so you need to concentrate on pumping it out.

IncidentDef.label: Excess gas
IncidentDef.letterText: It seems that the percentage of ore gases in the mine has increased, and it has become much harder for the miners to breathe.

IncidentDef.label: Gas explosion
IncidentDef.letterText: A sharp release of methane into the mine caused a powerful explosion and the collapse of some of the mine supports.

IncidentDef.label: Sneezing
Plot
IncidentDef.letterText: A hunter has entered your territory. He says that not far from your settlement there was a plot of one tribe, but wild animals drove them away. He can tell you her location.

IncidentDef.label: Mutations
IncidentDef.letterText: Some colonists complain about unnatural mutations in their bodies. They may be harmless, or they may be hazardous to health. In any case, do not leave the situation unattended. The following {1} complain about symptoms:\n\n{3}

IncidentDef.label: Fair!
IncidentDef.letterText: You were invited to a fair where there will be a lot of traders (from factions whose relations are either neutral or friendly).

IncidentDef.label: Gladiator fights
IncidentDef.letterText: The faction {0} holds gladiator fights. The battles take place in real time, so if you want to participate, try to choose the best warrior with the best equipment. After that, send him to the arena.

IncidentDef.label: Lean year
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} had a lean year. They substantially raise the prices for buying and selling food and seeds.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Excess goods
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} has established mass production. Quantity {2} increased by {3}% and price fell by {4}%.

IncidentDef.label: Weapons modernization
IncidentDef.letterLabel: The settlement {0} makes modernization of weapons.
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} modifies its stock of weapons. They are ready to buy weapons at an inflated price.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Big harvest
IncidentDef.letterLabel: Settlement {0} had a good harvest year.
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} had a good harvest year. They sell large stocks of food at a low price.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Concessions to the workers
IncidentDef.letterText: Worker settlements {0}, factions {1} forced the leaders to make concessions, which led to a reduction in production and higher prices.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Labor riots
IncidentDef.letterText: The settlement {0}, faction {1} began serious labor unrest. Leaders refuse to make concessions, production has almost stopped, and prices have skyrocketed.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Population consolidation
IncidentDef.letterText: The leaders of the settlement {0}, faction {1} were able to establish a transparent system of commodity relations, which led to an increase in population consolidation and an increase in production efficiency.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Changing of the climate
IncidentDef.letterText: On the territory of the settlement {0}, faction {1}, unnatural natural disasters occur. This led to a deterioration in the production situation and a drop in the efficiency of agriculture.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Attraction of slave labor
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} forces a huge number of forced laborers to work. This resulted in faster production and lower prices.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Pests
IncidentDef.letterText: The fields of the settlement {0}, fractions {1} are destroyed by pests. This will seriously raise food prices.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Drought
IncidentDef.letterText: A large-scale drought has begun at the {0} settlement, {1} faction. Food production has been disrupted.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Production expansion
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} begins extensive production growth, which leads to an expansion of the supply of goods.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Reducing production
IncidentDef.letterText: The settlement {0}, faction {1} has a production decline. This will reduce the number of items for sale.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Mine collapse
IncidentDef.letterText: In the settlement {0}, faction {1}, underground tunnels for resource extraction collapsed, which significantly complicates work and leads to higher prices.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Tunnel expansion
IncidentDef.letterText: In the settlement {0}, faction {1} expanded the network of tunnels for mining. This will produce more goods and lead to lower prices.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Livestock escape
IncidentDef.letterText: In the settlement {0}, factions {1} animals were able to get out of the pens and fled. This will damage the breeding process and reduce the number of goods.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Effective breeding
IncidentDef.letterText: In the {0} settlement, the {1} factions were able to achieve good animal demographics using new breeding techniques. This will increase the number of items for sale, as well as lower prices.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Scientific breakthrough
IncidentDef.letterText: In the {0} settlement of the {1} faction, a series of ingenious scientific discoveries have been made, which has led to the creation of many new relevant scientific works for sale.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Scientific stagnation
IncidentDef.letterText: In the {0} settlement of the {1} faction, no major research has been done for a long time, and the commercial scientific libraries are empty.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Database update
IncidentDef.letterText: In the settlement {0}, faction {1}, the scientific database is being updated. This requires a large number of blank books for records, which they will purchase at a high price.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Sale
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} gets rid of obsolete and unnecessary things. To attract customers, the prices of goods have been significantly reduced.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Commodity hype
IncidentDef.letterText: In the settlement {0}, faction {1}, a successful advertising campaign was carried out, which caused a stir. This has led to higher prices for goods.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Increased demand
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} is in need of a commodity, which, apparently, will be used for speculation and insider trading with neighbors. They are willing to purchase it at a very high price.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Assortment renewal
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} has come to the conclusion that it is inexpedient to trade a certain commodity and want to get rid of it at a very low price.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Slave uprisings
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} has been subjected to an uprising by the rabble, they are forced to stop the slave trade for a while.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Successful raid
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} reports an extremely successful raid that they managed to complete. The slave market fills with goods.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Labor shortage
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} is experiencing a shortage of workers, which is forcing a reduction in the slave trade.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Fish migration
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} managed to catch a huge amount of fish due to seasonal migration. The market is flooded with cheap fish.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Water pollution
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} has been contaminated by local fishing waters. Most of the fish have died and been poisoned, reducing the supply at the seafood market.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Quarry collapse
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} quarry has collapsed. Restoring work to the previous level will take some time.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Quarry deepening
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} is deepening mining quarries, which leads to an oversupply of goods for sale.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Change of arsenals
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} wants to rearm. They will purchase weapons at a great price.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Workshop expansion
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} is expanding the workshops, which will increase the production of goods.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Major military order
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} fulfills a large military order with a profitable customer, which increases the average prices for goods and their quantity.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Flora diversity
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} flowers and plants have appeared that are unusual for the region. This increases the production of bee products.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Bee poisoning
IncidentDef.letterText: In the settlement {0}, fraction {1}, there was a mass poisoning of bees with chemical reagents of unknown origin. Beekeeping is in crisis.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Dirty impurities
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1}, according to rumors, adds uncharacteristic dirty impurities to alloy casting products. This increases the quantity of goods and reduces their price.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Experimental prosthetics
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} is conducting an experiment, as a result of which they manage to increase the production of prosthetics and reduce prices.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Rich excavation site
IncidentDef.letterText: Archaeologists in the settlement {0}, faction {1} have discovered a very interesting and rich excavation site, which has led to an increase in the supply of goods.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Deficiency of finds
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} hasn't found anything of value in the course of work for a long time, which reduces the number of goods for sale.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Transshipment point
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} has become a major trade hub for travelers looking to resupply. The assortment of goods is increasing.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Scarce supplies
IncidentDef.letterText: Settlement {0}, faction {1} is experiencing supply issues for production. They are forced to slow it down and reduce the supply.\n{2}

IncidentDef.label: Festival
IncidentDef.letterText: Friendly faction {Faction} is holding a festival! Participation in it is guaranteed to give you culture, and may also be lucky for additional bonuses. However, entry requires an item {ThingDef}, a quality of at least {MinQuality} and an amount of {TargetCount}. Collect a caravan with the desired item, and move to the point of holding.

IncidentDef.label: Iron Nanny
IncidentDef.letterText: An ancient, crazy machine has wandered into your territory. Nobody knows who created it. Apparently there was a serious glitch in her AI that led to extremely aggressive behavior.

IncidentDef.label: Local nuclear war
IncidentDef.letterText: Faction {0} launches nuclear missiles at their enemies! We can expect retaliatory nuclear strikes against the aggressor. It seems that this will not affect us, but just in case it is worth finding shelter.

IncidentDef.label: Nuclear attack
IncidentDef.letterText: Faction {0} sent a nuclear missile towards us! All that remains is to run and pray.

IncidentDef.label: Nuclear war
IncidentDef.letterText: The world's nuclear factions are preparing to launch missiles! Everyone take cover, a global nuclear war begins.

IncidentDef.label: DDOS
IncidentDef.letterText: A DDOS attack has begun on your network infrastructure. It is unknown how long it will last. The computing power of your computers has been reduced by {Perfomance}%.

IncidentDef.label: Satellite fall
IncidentDef.letterText: An unidentified satellite crashes on your territory. Debris can cause damage to your property and life!

IncidentDef.label: Trash tornado
IncidentDef.letterText: A powerful tornado, which apparently has already passed through many other settlements, because of which it will scatter everything it has collected there.

IncidentDef.label: Meteo flash
IncidentDef.letterText: An unusual flash occurred in the sun. It did not affect electrical appliances, but affected all the settlers in the colony; the elderly were most negatively affected.

IncidentDef.description: A group of aggressive desert scavengers has come to your territory. It will take them some time to assess the area before they attack.

IncidentDef.label: Arachnids infestation!
IncidentDef.description: A group of lost arachnids are breaking into your base! It seems they have entered the wrong tunnel, but they are extremely aggressive!
